name: Annie H. Miller et al., Appellants, v. William M. Thompson et al., Ex'rs of John A. Nicolls

judges: Before Sterrett, C. J., Green, McCollum, Mitchell and Fell, JJ.
parties: Annie H. Miller et al., Appellants, v. William M. Thompson et al., Ex’rs of John A. Nicolls.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The questions involved in this case stated are substantially the same as those considered and disposed of in an opinion just filed in No. 361 January Term, 1896, Mary M. Jourdan et al. v. Silas M. Dean et al.,.supra, 599. In the court below and here both cases were argued together; and for reasons given'in the opinion referred to, the judgment in this case should be affirmed on the opinion of the court below.
Judgment affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Annie H. Miller et al., Appellants, v. William M. Thompson et al., Ex’rs of John A. Nicolls.
May 25, 1896:
Argued May 13, 1896.
Appeal No. 362, Jan. T., 1896, by plaintiffs, from judgment of C. P. Fayette Co., June T., 1894, No. 61, in case stated.
Before Sterrett, C. J., Green, McCollum, Mitchell and Fell, JJ.
Affirmed.
Error assigned was entering judgment for defendants on case stated.
